Label.en: Roads from Dieppe to Paris were well kept, protected, and fish merchants were exempt from local tolls and taxes
Label.fr: Roads from Dieppe to Paris were well kept, protected, and fish merchants were exempt from local tolls and taxes
Label.es: Roads from Dieppe to Paris were well kept, protected, and fish merchants were exempt from local tolls and taxes
Label.zh: Roads from Dieppe to Paris were well kept, protected, and fish merchants were exempt from local tolls and taxes

Label.en: Once they got to Paris they could sell all their fish at once, and also be paid immediately, which was very unusual!
Label.fr: Once they got to Paris they could sell all their fish at once, and also be paid immediately, which was very unusual!
Label.es: Once they got to Paris they could sell all their fish at once, and also be paid immediately, which was very unusual!
Label.zh: Once they got to Paris they could sell all their fish at once, and also be paid immediately, which was very unusual!

Label.en: As a legacy to this, to this day, fish that you eat in seaside restaurants in France often comes from Paris
Label.fr: As a legacy to this, to this day, fish that you eat in seaside restaurants in France often comes from Paris
Label.es: As a legacy to this, to this day, fish that you eat in seaside restaurants in France often comes from Paris
Label.zh: As a legacy to this, to this day, fish that you eat in seaside restaurants in France often comes from Paris
